Class GroupService

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.service.GroupService
@Service public class GroupService extends Object
Service to manage project groups.

    • deleteGroup

      public void deleteGroup(String projectName, String groupName, boolean unlinkSubjects)
      Delete the group by name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - project name
      groupName - group name
      unlinkSubjects - unset group for each linked subject
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the project or group is not found.

    • createGroup

      public GroupDTO createGroup(String projectName, GroupDTO groupDto)
      Create the group.
      Parameters:
      projectName - project name
      groupDto - group values
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the project is not found.
      ConflictException - if the group name already exists.

    • updateGroupSubjects

      public void updateGroupSubjects(String projectName, String groupName, List<GroupPatchOperation.SubjectPatchValue> subjectsToAdd, List<GroupPatchOperation.SubjectPatchValue> subjectsToRemove)
      Add subjects to group.
      Parameters:
      projectName - project name
      groupName - group name
      subjectsToAdd - patch items for subjects to be added
      subjectsToRemove - patch items for subjects to be removed
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the project or group is not found.
